tagline: A deaf and dumb person is the solitary eye-witness in this case, however, the trial Court did not determine the level of his comprehension. There is also nothing on record to show how the Court concluded that Muhammad Munir was "well versed with his language of signals." It is also not clear in what capacity Muhammad Munir interpreted the sign language of the deaf and dumb witness, whether he did so as a translator or as an expert in terms of Article 59 of the Qanun-e-Shahadat.
